sentences.en: Although it is often vulgar and unrefined, its implied meaning can be both deep and eloquent.
sentences.cn: 它虽然不雅,甚至粗俗, 但却具有极强的表意功能.

sentences.en: But it is present in unrefined flour and of course in vegetables.
sentences.cn: 可是在未加工的面粉或蔬菜中就含有纤维.

sentences.en: Diesel fuel is low - grade and comparatively unrefined.
sentences.cn: 柴油引擎的燃料是等级且未精炼的.

sentences.en: Fiber is present in large amounts in unrefined flour, wholemeal bread, fruits and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 在粗制面粉 、 全麦面包 、 水果和蔬菜中含有大量的纤维.

sentences.en: He's got more money than taste , ie is rich but unrefined.
Refined girls are often drawn to unrefined men.
So crude and unrefined as to be lacking in discrimination and sensibility.
sentences.cn: (指人)如此愚钝,缺乏辨别力和敏感度.

sentences.en: The dignity of the occasion was lost when he cut in with an unrefined joke.
sentences.cn: 他突然插进一则粗俗不堪的笑话,使当时的庄严气氛丧失殆尽.

sentences.en: Unrefined carbohydrates include brown rice and other grains.
sentences.cn: 糙米和其他谷物属非精制的碳水化合物。

sentences.en: Unrefined foods, especially those are high in fiber, stimulate appetite - suppressing hormones and make you feel full.
sentences.cn: 多吃粗粮, 尤其高纤维食品.因为他们能产生抑制食欲激素,容易有饱腹感.

sentences.en: Unrefined sugar made from palm sap.

trans.tran_en: an unrefined sub­stance is in its natural form
